この詩

The song I've been humming is one
that's been passed down in this village.
Would you like me to teach it to you?

column3: おはようございます

column3: 今から寝るところなんですまた明日…

I'm going to sleep now.
Good night.

column3: あら…さようなら
column4: Oh... Farewell.

column3:
神秘的な詩ですよね…

また聞きたくなったら
いつでも声をかけてくださいね
column4:
It's such a haunting song...


Just let me know if you'd like to hear it
again.

column3: はい
column4: Hello.

column4:
The song I've been humming is one
that's been passed down in this village.
Shall I teach it to you?

column3:
リトの巨塔の黒き体
日の高き時"真の心の在り処を示す
しかして心は眠りの中
熱き炎が その魂を目覚めさせん
column4:
The pride of the Rito, pillar in the sky,
its heart lights up when the sun is high.

The heart shines upon a path not whole,
but a warming flame can stir its soul.

column3: 分かりました それじゃ早速…
column4: I understand. I'll hurry to it then.

column3:
旅行者さん…
神獣 ヴァ・メドーご覧になりました？
あれのせいで みんな参っているんです…

私もあれを見るたび ため息ばかり…
column4:
Say, traveler...


I take it you've seen
Divine Beast Vah Medoh?
Everyone is at a loss as to what to do...
I can't help but sigh every time I look
skyward.

column3: 裸… ですか？
column4: Are you...uh...naked?

column3: 寒い村なのに元気ですね…
column4:
You're pretty energetic despite the cold
here...

column3: 早く服を着た方が いいんじゃないですか？
column4: Hurry up and put some clothes on.

column3:
今日の天気はイマイチですね…
ちょっと憂鬱です
column4:
Shame about the weather today...
The weather always affects my mood.

column3: 神獣 ヴァ・メドーのせいで ため息ばかり…
column4:
There have been a lot of troubled
faces around here ever since
Divine Beast Vah Medoh appeared.

column3:
いつになったら
心穏やかに暮らせる日が来るのかしら？
column4:
When will we be able to go back to living
a relaxed life here?

column3:
神獣 ヴァ・メドーが
私達を襲わなくなったんですって
もう それだけで嬉しくって…
column4:
I heard that Divine Beast Vah Medoh
has been appeased. It just sends my
heart soaring!

column3:
でも こんな天気だから
お散歩はまだまだお預けですね…
column4:
But with the weather like this,
I'll have to put that on hold...

column3:
そう言えばさっき
思わず古い詩を口ずさんじゃいましたが…
ひょっとして聞こえちゃいましたか？
column4:
I didn't even realize I had started singing
this old song.

Did you hear me singing it?

column3: この村に伝わる詩 お教えしましょうか？

down in this village. Want me to teach it

The pride of the Rito, pillar in the sky,

ちょっと思い出せないので"知りたかったら

column4:
...Uhhh. There's more to the song, but I
forget the rest of the words.

You should ask my sister, Laissa, if you
want to know the rest.

column3:

詩の続きを お聞きになったんですね

詩を お聞きになりますか？
column4:

the rest of the song?

I also remembered the rest of the words.
Do you want to hear them?

column3: わかりました それでは…
column4: OK...

column3:
それにしても この詩

なんだか気になりますね…

But still...
What does it all mean?

Not knowing bothers me...
